typeDescription.name: edu.cmu.lti.csd.types.NGramTokenAnnotation
typeDescription.description: the NGramTokenAnnotation extends the functionality from Generic token and leverages it providing additional data requiredd to be associated with a token.

featureDescription.name: partOfSpeech
featureDescription.description: the part of speech which the token belongs to eg. noun, adjective,noun phrase.

featureDescription.name: confidenceScore
featureDescription.description: the confidenece score associated with the token

featureDescription.name: producer
featureDescription.description: The module which produced the annotation

typeDescription.name: edu.cmu.lti.csd.types.TestElement
typeDescription.description: Encapsulation for a basic document Test Element documentation

featureDescription.name: lines
featureDescription.description: a string containing all the lines in the document

featureDescription.name: answerSpanList
featureDescription.description: A list of all the basic annotated answers

featureDescription.name: producer
featureDescription.description: the component which produced this type

typeDescription.name: edu.cmu.lti.csd.types.TokenSpan
typeDescription.description: Extends the funcionality of Generic token. Token span indicates that we are dealing with sentences.An encapsulation for sentences.

typeDescription.name: edu.cmu.lti.csd.types.Answer
typeDescription.description: Specialized kind of token span dealing only with answer spans.

featureDescription.name: score
featureDescription.description: The score associated with each answer 1(true)or 0(false).

typeDescription.name: edu.cmu.lti.csd.types.Question
typeDescription.description: Specialized kind of a token span used to deal only with question type of span.

typeDescription.name: edu.cmu.lti.csd.types.EvaluationReport
typeDescription.description: An encapsulation for the report which is required.

featureDescription.name: sortedAnswerSpans
featureDescription.description: an answerlist which has answers sorted on the basis of their scores.

typeDescription.name: edu.cmu.lti.csd.types.AnswerList
typeDescription.description: A list of type Answer created to provide greater encapsulation for answers (Answer List).

typeDescription.name: edu.cmu.lti.csd.types.GenericTokenAnnotation
typeDescription.description: Bare minimum artifacts which have to be a part of annotation for token.

featureDescription.name: range
featureDescription.description: range of the token in the document

featureDescription.name: stringSet
featureDescription.description: can be actual token value of any granularity

typeDescription.name: edu.cmu.lti.csd.types.GenericTokenList
typeDescription.description: An encapsulation for a list of genericTokens.
